column3: â€œI reeeally don't dig the taste and scent of this strain, but then again I don't like coffee! The high, though, is great--very clear head, very heavy body. I then did transition into more of a heady high, though, which was a bit odd but I dug it anyway!â€

â€œBlack Bubba has a different aroma. It has a very mild coffee scent with a curious smell my nose can't quite pick out. We smoked it out of a bong. It has a very relaxed and  smooth hit. I was surprised at how calm it was inhaled. The effects of this strain include an intense cerebral high combined with a mild body high.â€
â€œSuper sedative, great for sleep and restless legs. The flavor isn't my favorite but it's not offensive.â€

â€œThis strain is a powerful indica strain that as soon as you smoke it it goes straight to your head. Definitely a happy relaxing highâ€
â€œThis was the strain that introduced me to weed lmao what a throwback.â€

â€œPerfect sleepy weed.  Your body will melt into the couch or bed.  I smoked a few bong rips of this the other night before bed, and I was out for the count.  Super heavy indica.  Donâ€™t smoke this when you have plans to be productive.â€
â€œI really like this strain. I have a stress induced seizure disorder and it just made all the stress melt away.â€
â€œGood strain good high but I found a seed but over all mellow high.â€

â€œI had Black Bubba in Cali, yrs ago, (about 10 yrs) maybe more! It was awesome!
